title: Pokémon Arceus: Battle System Updates and More! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.18.21
description:
Janet and Andy talk all about today's Pokémon presentation with more info on Pokémon Arceus, Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:02:58 - Pokemon Presents
00:41:43 - Ad
00:45:30 - Ubisoft Studio Under Investigation Over Sexual Harassment, Workplace Discrimination Reports - Kotaku
00:51:50 - Kazuma Kiryu from Yakuza is in Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania - Eurogamer
00:56:54 - Abandoned Gameplay Reveal Is 'a Few Months' Away, But Trailer App Will Be Updated Sooner - IGN
01:04:00 - Out today
01:04:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim and Tam
